episodes.title: Kenya starvation cult leader charged in connection with 52 further deaths
episodes.description:
Kenya starvation cult leader charged in connection with 52 further deaths

Former cult leader Paul Mackenzie, already on trial for multiple counts of manslaughter, is facing new charges, Kenyan prosecutors said on Monday.  

READ MORE : http://www.africanews.com/2026/01/27/kenya-starvation-cult-leader-charged-in-connection-with-52-further-deaths

episodes.title: Fresh graves unearthed in Kenya near Shakahola cult tragedy
episodes.description:
Fresh graves unearthed in Kenya near Shakahola cult tragedy

More than two years after the discovery of over 400 bodies linked to a doomsday cult in Shakahola Forest, authorities have uncovered five more bodies in a nearby village in Kilifi County. In addition to the exhumed remains, ten human body parts were found scattered across nearby thickets.

READ MORE : http://www.africanews.com/2025/08/23/fresh-graves-unearthed-in-kenya-near-shakahola-cult-tragedy

episodes.title: Kenya finds new mass graves near Shakahola cult site
episodes.description:
Kenya finds new mass graves near Shakahola cult site

 In a grim echo of a national tragedy, Kenyan authorities have exhumed five corpses from shallow graves just two kilometers from the site where over 400 followers of a doomsday cult perished two years ago.

READ MORE : http://www.africanews.com/2025/08/22/new-graves-unearthed-near-notorious-kenyan-cult-site-echoing-past-horrors
